sentences.english: She rakes the ashes out of the stove in the evening every day.
sentences.chinese: 她每天晚上將爐渣從爐子裏耙出來。

sentences.english: Thus it shows that the coexistence theory of slag structure is applicable to slag system Na2O-SiO2 too.
sentences.chinese: 由此證明爐渣結構的共存理論對本渣系也是適用的。

sentences.english: A description is given of the production of fine coal ash bricks from gasifer slag and boiler cinder.
sentences.chinese: 介紹利用造氣爐渣和鍋爐廢渣生產粉煤灰磚的情況。

sentences.english: The leaching efficiency of copper smelter slag with high silicon is investigated in this study.
sentences.chinese: 研究了一種高效的浸出高硅銅冶爐渣的方法。

sentences.english: By-product materials like lime kiln dust (LKD), cement kiln dust, and fly ash are usually used to modify pavement subgrades.
sentences.chinese: 石灰爐渣和水泥爐渣常用於加固路基土。

sentences.english: By-product materials like lime kiln dust (LKD), cement kiln dust, and fly ash are usually used to modify pavement subgrades.
sentences.chinese: 石灰爐渣和水泥爐渣常用於加固路基土。

sentences.english: Dirty steel due to entrapment of slag or pieces of refractory.
sentences.chinese: 因夾雜爐渣或耐火材料顆粒而造成的不純淨鋼。

sentences.english: The development trend and prospect of metallurgical slag glass-ceramics are predicted.
sentences.chinese: 展望了爐渣微晶玻璃的發展前景。

sentences.english: Treatment of dyeing waste water by slag and smoke is easy and convenient.
sentences.chinese: 採用爐渣煙氣處理印染廢水是一種簡易可行的辦法。

sentences.english: Composition and distribution of slag can be determined through mineralogical morphology inspection.
sentences.chinese: 巖相檢驗方法可以確定爐渣的礦相組成和分佈。

sentences.english: To observe and study some regulators which influence the flotation of Copper mineral in Raranda slag of Daye, and probe into the function amd mechanism of the sodium sulphide.
sentences.chinese: 考察了一些調整劑對大冶含銅諾蘭達爐渣浮選的影響。

sentences.english: A microcomputerized viscosity metering system for molten slags is developed.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹液態爐渣粘度測定微型計算機控制系統。

sentences.english: At the same time, Comments on future technological development of the slag beneficiation and extraction are presented.
sentences.chinese: 對未來銅爐渣選礦及提取技術的發展提出了一些看法。

sentences.english: Methods for manufacturing glass ceramics from blast furnace slags are described.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了利用高爐爐渣製造微晶玻璃的方法。

sentences.english: Up until the point where they burnt us to cinders and brushed away what was left of the ashes.
sentences.chinese: 直到地步，他們燒燬我們爐渣和刷了剩下的灰燼。
